sentences.en: Despite scepticism, founder Trent Huang was no - nonsensical and confident about his company.
sentences.cn: 不过, 创办人黄川在介绍“咿呀.com” 的时候,却满是严肃和自信.

sentences.en: Despite scepticism, founder Trent Huang was nonsensical and confident about his company.
sentences.cn: 不过, 创办人黄川却满是严肃和自信.
上帝是种荒谬透顶的胡说.

sentences.en: He found himself inventing such impressively nonsensical propositions.
sentences.cn: 他写下了这样惹人注意的无聊话.

sentences.en: In fact, market prices are frequently nonsensical.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 市场经常是不合理的.

sentences.en: Incidentally , it is just nonsensical to talk of fattening food.
sentences.cn: 同样,如果讨论什么“增肥”食物, 那也是废话.

sentences.en: It seemed to me that Sir Robert's  arguments were nonsensical.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，罗伯特爵士的争辩纯属瞎说。

sentences.en: It seemed to me that Sir Robert's arguments were nonsensical.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，罗伯特爵士的争辩纯属瞎说。

sentences.en: The obvious mistakes of this novel are several nonsensical parts.
sentences.cn: 几处明显违反常识的部分正是这部小说的硬伤.

sentences.en: There were no nonsensical promises about reviving the economy.
sentences.cn: 复苏经济的承诺是千真万确的。
这些反对的理由是无稽之谈.
这是一场毫无意义的争论。

sentences.en: Under the influence of nitrous oxide , he found himself writing such impressively nonsensical propositions.
sentences.cn: 在笑气影响下, 他写下了这样惹人注意的无聊话.

sentences.en: We must develop enough inner strength to prevent other people's nonsense from making us nonsensical ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们必须培养足够的内在力量,以防止别人荒谬的言行让我们也变得荒谬起来.

sentences.en: What John talks is boastful and nonsensical in a fashion.
sentences.cn: 约翰的谈话有几分瞎吹胡说.

trans.tran_cn: 无意义的，荒谬的，愚蠢的，不像话，痴狂
trans.tran_en: ideas, actions, or statements that are nonsensical are not reasonable or sensible
